Docs.summary: Contains types that provide managed code access to the enhanced functionality of the Windows 7 taskbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Windows 7 taskbar provides enhanced functionality that enables you to use the taskbar button to communicate status to a user and expose common tasks when the window is minimized or hidden. The functionality exposed by the types in the <xref:System.Windows.Shell> namespace is not available in versions of Windows prior to Windows 7. In Windows 7, some functionality might not be available depending on the user's settings.
